text.title: Huai'an
text.head: Huai'an
text.p:
Huai'an
( 淮安 , Huái'ān ) is in the northern part of
Jiangsu
.
text.head: By plane

. Ground transportation : Express buses are available to two locations , one being the Dingli International Hotel , the other being the intersection of Datong Road and North Xiangyu Avenue . Regular buses , which stop at numerous stops , are available to Lianshui County . Taxis are also available .

text.head: By train
text.p:
Huai'an is served only by regular trains . High-speed rail will not become an option until around September 2019 . In the meantime , you may consider catching a high-speed train to
Xuzhou
and then catching a regular train to Huai'an from there .

list.item:
Huai'an Station
( 淮安站 ) , 18 Zhujiang Road , Huaiyin District , Huai'an ( 淮安市淮阴区珠江路18号 ) ( public bus routes 1 , 7 , 11 , 12 , 16 , 17 , 47 , 101 , 107 , 111 , and Huaiyin 210 ) . In the city 's north , not far from the Huai'an North Bus Station .

Huai'an South Station
( 淮安南站 ) , 1 Xiamen Road , Qingjiangpu District , Huai'an ( 淮安市清江浦区厦门路1号 ) ( public bus routes 28 , 29 , 30 , 33 , 38 , 58 , 507 , and y33 ) . In the city center .

text.p: A third railway station , to be known as Huai'an East Station ( 淮安东站 ) , is currently being constructed in the city 's eastern suburbs . In the future , this will be the main station for high speed trains .
text.head: By bus

list.item:

( 淮安汽车总站 ) , 69 North Huaihai Road , Qingjiangpu District , Huai'an ( 淮安市清江浦区淮海北路69号 ) ( public bus routes 1 , 4 , 5 , 7 , 15 , 16 , 18 , 22 , 26 , 31 , 33 , 34 , 36 , 93 , 100 , 116 , q26 , y100 , y15 , and y33 ) . In the city center . This is Huai'an 's busiest bus station . Buses are available to a wide range of destinations both within and beyond the region .

Huai'an North Bus Station
( 淮安汽车北站 ) , 167 Zhujiang Road , Huaiyin District , Huai'an ( 淮安市淮阴区珠江路167号 ) ( public bus routes 5 , 12 , 16 , 37 , 39 , 107 , 116 , Huayin 201 , Huaiyin 202 , Huaiyin 203 , Huaiyin 205 , Huaiyin 206 , Huaiyin 207 , Huaiyin 208 , Huaiyin 210 , and Huaiyin 212 ) . In the city 's north . This is Huai'an 's second busiest bus station . Buses are available to a wide range of destinations , though not as many as are available from the Central Bus Station .

Shandong

text.head: See

list.item:
Zhenhuai Building ( old city gate )
( 镇淮楼 ) , 2 Zhenhuai Road East , Huai'an District , Huai'an ( 淮安市淮安区镇淮楼东路2号 ) ( take bus nos 10 , 20 , 60 , 61 , 63 , 65 , 66 , 67 , 69 , 606 , or 618 and get off at the Zhenhuai Building bus stop ) . 7:30 - 18:30 . The Zhenhuai Building was constructed during the 12th century as a libation hall for the Jin army . In the 19th century , the building was rebuilt and given its present name , which literally means ' building that controls the Huai River ' , reflecting the fact that flooding of the river was a serious issue at the time . There is a small museum in the building . ¥ 10 .

Zhou Enlai Memorial Hall
( 周恩来纪念馆 ) , 2 Yonghuai Road , Huai'an District , Huai'an ( 淮安市淮安区永怀路2号 ) ( take bus nos 8 , 10 , 63 , 67 , or 618 and get off at the Huai'an Foreign Languages School bus stop , or take a tram on Line 1 and get off at either the Memorial Hall Station or the Huaxi Road Station ) , ☏ +8651785912365 . Summer : 08:30 - 17:00 ; other seasons : 08:30 - 16:30 . Contains exhibitions about the life and work of Zhou Enlai , one of the most prominent political figures in China during the 20th century . Free .

Zhou Enlai 's former residence
( 周恩来故居 ) , 7 Fuma Lane , Huai'an District , Huai'an ( 淮安市淮安区驸马巷7号 ) ( take bus nos 62 , 65 , 619 or y65 and get off at the bus stop named Zhou Enlai 's Former Residence ) , ☏ +8651785912365 . Summer : 08:30 - 17:00 ; other seasons : 08:30 - 16:30 . Zhou Enlai was born in this house in 1898 and lived here for the first 12 years of his life . Free .

The place where Zhou Enlai studied as a child
( 周恩来童年读书旧址 ) , 174 Caoyun Road West , Qinghe District , Huai'an ( 淮安市清河区漕运西路174号 ) ( take bus no . 30 and get off at the bus stop named after this place ) , ☏ +8651785912365 . This was a family school operated by Zhou Enlai 's elder relatives . Zhou Enlai attended classes here with his younger brother and his two younger sisters . Free .

Huai'an Government House
( 淮安府署，淮安府衙 ) , 38 Dongmen Street , Huai'an District , Huai'an ( 淮安市淮安区东门大街38号 ) ( take bus 69 and get off at either Shangban Street 上板街 or Caoyun Xiaoqu 漕运校区 ) , ☏ +8651785131181 . 08:30 - 18:00 . This is one of the very few surviving examples in China of a prefecture-level yamen . The complex was first built in 1370 and was restored several times after being damaged by fires . ¥ 60 .

Wu Cheng'en 's former residence
( 吴承恩故居 ) , 12 Datong Lane , Old Hexia Town , Huai'an District , Huai'an ( 淮安市淮安区河下古镇打铜巷12号 ) ( take bus nos. 62 , 65 , 69 , or y65 and get off at Zhuxiang Street 竹巷街 , then walk about 500 metres down the street until you come to Datong Lane ) , ☏ +8651785181895 , ✉ wcegj@163.com . Summer : 08:30 - 18:00 , winter : 08:30 - 17:30 . Wu Cheng'en , the acclaimed author of
Journey to the West
, lived here during the Ming Dynasty . ¥ 40 .

China Water Transport Museum
( 中国漕运博物馆 ) , Caoyun Square , Huai'an District , Huai'an ( 淮安市淮安区漕运广场 ) ( TAKE bus 69 and get off at Caoyun Xiaoqu 漕运校区 , the museum is opposite Huai'an Government House . ) , ☏ +8651785839097 , ✉ cybwg@qq.com . 08:30 - 12:00 , 13:30 - 17:30 . Huai'an has long been important port on the Grand Canal . This museum tells the story of Huai'an 's role in the transportation of grain to the imperial capital . ¥ 50 .

Huai'an Zoo
( 淮安动物园 ) , 198 Jiankang Road West , Qingjiangpu District , Huai'an ( 淮安市清江浦区健康西路198号 ) ( catch bus nos. 22 or 86 to get to the north gate or bus nos. 3 , 5 , 22 , 48 or 86 to get to the south gate ) , ☏ +8651783963924 . 08:00 - 16:30 . This zoo was established in 1958 and moved to the present location in 2012 . It has imported animals and native animals . ¥ 30 .

Wentong Pagoda
( 文通塔 ) , 46 Ximen Street , Huai'an District , Huai'an ( 淮安市淮安区西门大街46号 ) ( the pagoda is in the middle of a park along side the Wentong High School ; catch bus nos. 65 or y65 and get off at the bus stop named Pharmaceutical Company 医药公司 ) . The Wentong Pagoda was built in 708 , at which time it was known as the Zunsheng Pagoda . It was renamed the Wentong Pagoda in 1629 following a major renovation . In 1668 an earthquake caused severe damage to the pagoda and it had to be almost completely rebuilt .

Huai'an Museum
( 淮安市博物馆 ) , 1-146 Jiankang Road West , Qingjiangpu District , Huai'an ( 淮安市清江浦区健康西路146-1号 ) ( take bus nos 4 , 16 , 32 , 86 , 88 or 116 and get off at either Jiankang Road West 健康西路 or the South Campus of the No. 1 Elementary School of Huaiyin Teacher 's College 一附小南校区 ) , ☏ +8651783645659 , ✉ hasbwg@163.com . 09:00 - 12:00 , 13:30 - 17:30 . A museum about the history and culture of Huai'an . Free .
